_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Make your lives easier and better with affordable and innovative smart products.

instruction.en: Push the button for aprox 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Push a pin down the small hole on the side of the device for aprox 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.

hint.en: Reverse the contact alarm logic: magnet closed = alarm activated, magnet opened = alarm deactivated.

instruction.en: Push the reset button for aprox 8-10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly, if needed repeat 5 times.
Press the button on the side of the device for aprox 10 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.

instruction.en: Long press the button on the backside of the device for 5 seconds until the Zigbee signal icon flashes.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate a temperature offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 0.1, 
default: 0 [°C]

Set a correction to compensate a humidity offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 1, 
default: 0 [%]
hint.nl:
Stel een correctiewaarde in om een Luchtvochtigheids verschil te compenseren.
Bereik: -10 - 10, stap grootte 1, 
standaard: 0 [%]

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.

Set a min report interval.
Range: 0 - 65535, step size 1, 
default: 0 [seconds] (Press button on device within 10 seconds after saving settings)

Set a max report interval.
Range: 0 - 65535, step size 1, 
default: 3600 [seconds] 0 = disable periodic reporting, 65535 = no automatic reporting (Press button on device within 10 seconds after saving settings)

Set a min report change.
Range: 0 - 1000, step size 1, 
default: 10 [1 = 0,01 °C] (Press button on device within 10 seconds after saving settings)

Set a min report interval.
Range: 0 - 65535, step size 1, 
default: 0 [seconds] (Press button on device within 10 seconds after saving settings)

Set a max report interval.
Range: 0 - 65535, step size 1, 
default: 3600 [seconds] 0 = disable periodic reporting, 65535 = no automatic reporting (Press button on device within 10 seconds after saving settings)

Set a min report change.
Range: 0 - 1000, step size 1, 
default: 100 [1 = 0.01 %] (Press button on device within 10 seconds after saving settings)

instruction.en: Press and hold the button on the device for approximately 10 seconds until the LED blinks, indicating it's in pairing mode.

label.en: Time until motion alarm is reset (s)

hint.en:
Time from motion alarm triggers until it resets.
default: 3 [s]

Adjust the sensitivity level of the motion sensor.
1: 2.5m, 2: 3.5m, 3: 4m

Set the threshold for illumination to determine 'bright' or 'dim' conditions.
Default: 50

instruction.en: Press the button on the device for aprox 10 seconds until the red LED start blinking.

hint.en: Reverse the contact alarm logic: magnet closed = alarm activated, magnet opened = alarm deactivated.

instruction.en: Press and hold the button on the device for approximately 5 seconds until the LED blinks, indicating it's in pairing mode.

label.en: Time until motion alarm is reset (s)

hint.en:
Time from motion alarm triggers until it resets.
default: 3 [s]

instruction.en: Push the button on the side of the device for aprox 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.

hint.en:
Set a value to compensate a temperature offset.
Range: -10 - 10, step size 0.1, 
default: 0 [°C]

instruction.en: Press reset on top for approx 10 seconds until the red LED blinks.

hint.en: Adjust the local temperature calibration.

instruction.en: Open the back of the device and push a pin down the small hole marked RST for aprox 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.

hint.en: This setting determines the threshold before a battery alarm is given.

instruction.en: Four tiles will be created, one for each channel of the device. Press the setup button combined with 1 channel button for 10 seconds (the LED should blink blue).
Push the button for aprox 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Push the button for aprox 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.

hint.en: The device must support this feature. (Some device need a firmware update and some does not support it at all).

instruction.en: Push the button for aprox 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Push the button for aprox 5 seconds to enter pairing mode.
Press the button for 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
A tile for each button will be created. Remove the front and press the setup button for 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
A tile for each button will be created. Remove the front and press the setup button for 10 seconds (the LED should start blinking).
Push the button for aprox 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
Push a pin down the small hole on the side of the device for aprox 8 seconds until the LED blinks rapidly.
